video.title: Mako Mermaids: An H2O Adventure
video.synopsis: This "H2O" sequel follows Zac, a boy who accidentally turns into a merman and threatens the existence of three young mermaids who guard Mako Island.

episodes.synopsis: During a full moon, a land boy named Zac falls into the Moon Pool, and the power of the moon transforms him into a merman.
episodes.title: Outcasts

episodes.synopsis: Sirena, Lyla and Nixie must turn Zac back into a land boy. Using Sirena's Moon Ring, they give themselves legs and walk on land to begin their task.
episodes.title: Getting Legs

episodes.synopsis: Sirena, Lyla and Nixie follow Zac to school, but the school principal confronts them and takes Sirena's Moon Ring.
episodes.title: Meeting Rita

episodes.synopsis: When a waitress spills a drink on Lyla, she rushes to the cool room -- just before transforming into a mermaid!
episodes.title: Lyla Alone

episodes.synopsis: Rain keeps the mermaids indoors and unable to look for Zac. Lyla and Sirena try to use the Moon Ring to stop the rain, but they create a blizzard.
episodes.title: Blizzard

episodes.synopsis: Joe has a new boat and takes it out for a spin. His fish finder locates a dolphin, but it's not like any dolphin he's seen before.
episodes.title: Dolphin Tale

episodes.synopsis: Zac's struggle with his merman secret intensifies when his girlfriend, Evie, throws him a pool party.
episodes.title: Zac's Pool Party

episodes.synopsis: It's a full moon, and the mermaids think that if they keep Zac out of the moonlight, he'll lose his powers and return to his land-dwelling self.
episodes.title: Zac's Return to Mako

episodes.synopsis: While listening to Sirena sing, Lyla has an idea: If Sirena sings the "Enchantment Song" to Zac, he'll fall under her spell.
episodes.title: The Siren

episodes.synopsis: Against Nixie and Sirena's advice, Lyla helps Zac get to the Moon Pool. But when the entrance suddenly closes, they're trapped inside.
episodes.title: Zac Returns to Mako

episodes.synopsis: Fearing they'll never get the pod to return to Mako, a despondent Nixie finds herself at odds with Lyla and Sirena.
episodes.title: I Don't Believe in Mermaids

episodes.synopsis: Sirena is collecting shells on the reef when she sees merman Zac. Luckily, she torpedoes away before he recognizes her.
episodes.title: Close Call

episodes.synopsis: The full moon is once again upon Mako, and the mermaids have to stop Zac from getting the all-powerful Trident.
episodes.title: Betrayal

episodes.synopsis: Now that he knows Sirena, Lyla and Nixie are mermaids, Zac begins to wonder about his school principal, Rita, and why she helps them.
episodes.title: Battlelines

episodes.synopsis: When David invites Sirena to sing with him at the café, their connection grows. Lyla and Nixie fear that she might not want to return to the sea.
episodes.title: Sirena's Secret

episodes.synopsis: While showing off his brand-new smart phone, Cam takes video footage of Zac swimming as a merman.
episodes.title: Truce

episodes.synopsis: Zac finds a Moon Ring on the ocean floor, and when he gives the ring to Evie, the mermaids know it's no ordinary ring -- they have to get it back.
episodes.title: Moon Ring 2

episodes.synopsis: The mermaids keep a close watch on Zac at the Halloween party, but he evades them with Cam's help.
episodes.title: The Trident Job

episodes.synopsis: The Trident is every bit as powerful as Zac imagined -- but he can't get it to work. He wonders if the Trident needs to be activated by moonlight.
episodes.title: Where's the On Button?

episodes.synopsis: The Trident is active and dangerous, and the mermaids must take it from Zac. Knowing this, Zac searches for the perfect hiding place.
episodes.title: Nowhere to Hide

episodes.synopsis: Sirena's sister, Aquata, returns to Mako with great news: Sirena can return to the pod. Unfortunately, the invitation isn't extended to Lyla and Nixie.
episodes.title: Aquata Returns

episodes.synopsis: When Rita's cat, Poseidon, steps through a puddle of mermaid powders, he is transformed into a person.
episodes.title: Evie Times Two

episodes.synopsis: Zac manages to find the Trident, but Lyla is right behind him. As the two battle for possession, a flash of energy knocks Lyla unconscious.
episodes.title: Zac's Choice

episodes.synopsis: While Lyla tries to teach Zac more about the ocean and mermaid history, Nixie refuses to trust him.
episodes.title: Trust

episodes.synopsis: Behind Sirena and Lyla's backs, Nixie helps Cam get into the Moon Pool to unlock the Trident. But Evie insists on coming along for the dive.
episodes.title: Betrayed

episodes.synopsis: When Cam takes the Trident to Mako behind Nixie's back, the mermaids realize that he intends to turn himself into a merman so he can rule Mako Island.
episodes.title: Decision Time

episodes.synopsis: When the pod decides Zac is a threat and must give up his merman powers, two new mermaids, Mimmi and Ondina, are sent to make sure he obeys.
episodes.title: The Seventh Cycle

episodes.synopsis: With Evie now a mermaid, Mimmi and Ondina try a dangerous spell to change her back to a human form, but the results are less than ideal.
episodes.title: Sticky Situation

episodes.synopsis: When Zac has a powerful vision about his connection to Mako Island, he and the mermaids visit the island to investigate.
episodes.title: Discovery

episodes.synopsis: Erik's curiosity about the girls and Mako Island becomes a problem when he decides to investigate further.
episodes.title: A New Tail

episodes.synopsis: When Evie's dad decides to take tourists on dive charters to Mako Island, the gang must find a way to change his mind.
episodes.title: Bad For Business

episodes.synopsis: Sirena gives Evie mermaid lessons, which rubs Ondina the wrong way, while Erik tries to get to the bottom of Zac and Cam's falling out.
episodes.title: Stormy Seas

episodes.synopsis: With the full moon approaching, Zac's plan to avoid Mako Island is dealt a blow when his father insists they go on their annual camping trip.
episodes.title: Awakening

episodes.synopsis: When Mimmi goes to the first day of the new school year, things get out of hand fast when she runs afoul of the science teacher.
episodes.title: Land School

episodes.synopsis: When a young mermaid follows Ondina back to Mako Island after a mermaid council meeting, it could spell trouble with the pod.
episodes.title: Stowaway

episodes.synopsis: When David sees Evie in the water as a mermaid, it puts Zac and the girls' secret at risk unless they can convince David he's wrong.
episodes.title: Keeping The Secret

episodes.synopsis: Ondina adds too much jellyfish extract to Mimmi's body lotion, and the results put Principal Santos in dangerous waters at the marine park.
episodes.title: Only As Young As You Feel

episodes.synopsis: When Mimmi loses her moon ring in the Ocean Café's cooler room, it creates havoc for David and his brother's business.
episodes.title: Supersized

episodes.synopsis: On the night of the full moon, Zac and Erik swim to Mako Island and unlock the merman chamber, revealing a startling secret.
episodes.title: Reunion

episodes.synopsis: Zac struggles to come to terms with the news that he's a real merman, he's adopted and Mimmi is his sister.
episodes.title: A New Man

episodes.synopsis: After Cam absorbs moon pool water, he discovers he has power over water, which gets him a place in the trials for the school swim team.
episodes.title: Careful What You Wish For

episodes.synopsis: Ondina sneaks Erik into the grotto to duplicate a pearl he gave her, but she accidentally turns him into a copy of Poseidon.
episodes.title: First Date

episodes.synopsis: When Erik dives down and touches one of the rock outcrops on Mako reef, he's transported into a sphere of endless water with no way out.
episodes.title: The Merman Code

episodes.synopsis: When Sirena sees a video that shows a kayaker being lured by a mermaid's song, she starts to follow David obsessively, and he falls under her spell.
episodes.title: The Siren

episodes.synopsis: A surprise birthday party is in the works for Evie, who accidentally shrinks herself and falls into an aquarium after trying on Mimmi's moon ring.
episodes.title: Surprise!

episodes.synopsis: Mimmi takes a job at the marine park, where she meets Chris, a young man who is desperate to get into a dolphin training program.
episodes.title: The Job

episodes.synopsis: On the night of the full moon, Zac and Ondina sneak away to Mako, and Ondina reveals her plan to destroy the chamber.
episodes.title: New Orders

episodes.synopsis: Ondina doesn't want to choose between Erik and the pod when the pod returns. To cheer her up, Erik decides to throw a party in the café.
episodes.title: The Last Dance

episodes.synopsis: At the marine park, Ondina and Mimmi get into trouble when a dolphin splashes them and a little girl sees them transform into mermaids.
episodes.title: Stay or Go

episodes.synopsis: When Evie comes down with a fever that causes the temperature in the room to soar, Carly suspects that her friend is keeping a secret from her.
episodes.title: The Truth About Evie

episodes.synopsis: When Erik learns that the trident stone is the missing element needed to activate the merman chamber, Zac gives it to the mermaids for safekeeping.
episodes.title: The Trident Stone

episodes.synopsis: The chamber's true purpose is revealed: to drain the magic from all mermaids. Zac risks his life to shut it down and restore the mermaids' magic.
episodes.title: The Chosen One
